scripts.deps: yarn run deps:lib && yarn run deps:sarif && yarn run deps:github-snapshot && yarn run deps:cli
scripts.deps:dev: yarn run deps:dev:lib && yarn run deps:dev:sarif && yarn run deps:dev:github-snapshot && yarn run deps:dev:cli
scripts.link:lib: cd lib && yarn unlink || true && yarn link
scripts.link:sarif: cd sarif && yarn unlink || true && yarn link
scripts.link:github-snapshot: cd github-snapshot && yarn unlink || true && yarn link
scripts.link: yarn run link:lib && yarn run link:sarif && yarn run link:github-snapshot
scripts.build:lib: yarn run deps:dev:lib && cd lib && yarn run build
scripts.build:sarif: yarn run deps:dev:sarif && yarn run link:lib && cd sarif && yarn link @nowsecure/platform-lib && yarn run build
scripts.build:github-snapshot: yarn run deps:dev:github-snapshot && yarn run link:lib && cd github-snapshot && yarn link @nowsecure/platform-lib && yarn run build
scripts.build:cli: yarn run deps:dev:cli && yarn run link && cd cli && yarn run link-deps && yarn run build
scripts.build: yarn run deps:dev && yarn run build:lib && yarn run build:sarif && yarn run build:github-snapshot && yarn run build:cli
scripts.clean: yarn run clean:cli && yarn run clean:sarif && yarn run clean:github-snapshot && yarn run clean:lib
scripts.make-package: yarn run deps:dev && yarn run link && yarn run clean && yarn --cwd cli run link-deps && yarn --cwd cli run make-package
